FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA3921 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">In the case of Excess Shares transferred into the
trust as a result of a Deemed Original Issuance, the Disqualified Recipient will
receive the lesser of (1) the price paid by the Disqualified Recipient for the 
shares or, if the Disqualified Recipient did not give value for the shares in 
connection with the Original Issuance, the fair market value (determined in 
accordance with the formula set forth in our certificate of incorporation) of 
the shares on the date of the Deemed Original Issuance (the &#8220;Deemed 
Original Issuance Price&#8221;) and (2) the price received by the trustee from 
the sale of the shares. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA3922 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3923 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">Any net sale proceeds in excess of the amount payable to the Restricted 
Person will be promptly paid to the charitable beneficiary. If such shares are 
sold by the Restricted Person prior to our discovery that shares of our Class A 
common stock should have been transferred to the trust, then (1) the shares will
be deemed to have been sold on behalf of the trust and (2) to the extent that 
the Restricted Person received an amount for the shares that exceeds the amount 
such Restricted Person was entitled to receive, the excess will be paid to the 
trustee upon demand. In addition, shares of our Class A common stock held in the
trust will be deemed to have been offered for sale to the Company at a price per
share equal to the lesser of (1) the fair market value (determined in accordance
with the formula set forth in our certificate of incorporation) on the date we 
accept the offer and (2) the Proposed Transfer Price, the Status Change Price or
the Deemed Original Issuance Price, as the case may be, of such Excess Shares. 
We will have the right to accept the offer until the trustee has sold the 
shares. Upon a sale to the Company, the interest of the charitable beneficiary 
in the shares sold will terminate and the trustee will distribute to the 
Restricted Person the portion of the net proceeds from the sale due to the 
Restricted Person and pay the remainder, if any, to the charitable beneficiary 
of the trust. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3924 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3925 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif"><I>Redemption of Excess Shares </I></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3926 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3927 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">To the extent that the above trust transfer provisions would be 
ineffective for any reason, our certificate of incorporation provides that, to 
prevent the percentage of aggregate shares of our Class A common stock owned by 
non-U.S. citizens from exceeding the Maximum Permitted Percentage, we, by action
of our Board of Directors, in its sole discretion, will have the power (but not 
the obligation) to redeem all or any portion of such Excess Shares, unless such 
redemption is not permitted under applicable law. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3928 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<DIV id=PGBK5284  style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<DIV id=PGFTR5284  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV id=PGNUM5284  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: 
center">13</DIV>
<HR style="HEIGHT: 2px; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV id=PGHDR5284  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P id=PARA5284.2 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3929 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">Until such Excess Shares are redeemed, the Restricted Persons owning such
shares will not be entitled to any voting rights with respect to such shares and
we will pay any dividends or distributions with respect to such shares into an 
escrow account. Full voting, distribution and dividend rights will be restored 
to such Excess Shares (and any dividends or distributions paid into an escrow 
account will be paid to holders of record of such shares), promptly after the 
time and to the extent the Board of Directors determines that such shares no 
long constitute Excess Shares, unless such shares have already been redeemed by 
the Company. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3930 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3931 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">If our Board of Directors determines to redeem Excess Shares, the 
redemption price of such Excess Shares will be an amount equal to (1) the lesser
of (x) the fair market value (determined in accordance with the formula set 
forth in our certificate of incorporation) on the redemption date and (y) in the
case of a Proposed Transfer, the Proposed Transfer Price of such Excess Shares, 
in the case of a Status Change, the Status Change Price of such Excess Shares 
or, in the case of a Deemed Original Issuance, the Deemed Original Issuance 
Price of such Excess Shares, minus (2) any dividends or distributions received 
by such Restricted Person with respect to such Excess Shares prior to and 
including the redemption date instead of being paid into the escrow account. Our
Board of Directors may, in its discretion, pay the redemption price in cash or 
by the issuance of interest-bearing promissory notes with a maturity of up to 10
years and bearing a fixed rate equal to the yield on the U.S. Treasury Note of 
comparable maturity. Upon redemption, any dividends or distributions that have 
been paid into an escrow account with respect to such redeemed shares will be 
paid by the escrow agent for such account to a charitable organization that is a
U.S. citizen designated by the Company, net of any taxes and other costs and 
expenses of the escrow agent. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3932 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3933 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"><I>Permitted
Actions by the Board of Directors Relating to the Maritime Restrictions
</I></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3934 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3935 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">In addition to the foregoing restrictions, so that we may assure 
compliance with the applicable U.S. maritime and vessel documentation laws, our 
certificate of incorporation authorizes our Board of Directors to effect any and
all measures necessary or desirable (consistent with the provisions of our 
certificate of incorporation) to fulfill the purpose of and to implement the 
Maritime Restrictions, including: </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3936 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB3938  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA3939 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA3940 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">obtaining, as a condition precedent to the 
transfer of shares of our Class A common stock, a citizenship certification and 
any other documentation we or our transfer agent deems advisable from the 
transferee of such shares (and persons on whose behalf shares of our Class A 
common stock are to be held); </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA3941 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB3943  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA3944 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA3945 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">determining the citizenship of any owner of 
shares of our Class A common stock and, in making such determination, relying 
upon the stock transfer records of the Company, the citizenship certificates and
other documentation given by owners or their transferees and such other written 
statements and affidavits and such other proof as we may deem reasonable; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA3946 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB3948  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA3949 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA3950 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">developing issuance, transfer, redemption, escrow
and legend notice provisions and procedures regarding certificated and 
uncertificated shares of our Class A common stock; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA3951 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB3953  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA3954 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA3955 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">establishing and maintaining a dual stock 
certificate system under which different forms of certificates are issued to 
U.S. citizens and non-U.S. citizens; and </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA3956 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB3958  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA3959 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA3960 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">mandating that all shares of Class A common stock
issued by the Company include the legend specified in our certificate of 
incorporation (or other appropriate legend reflecting the Maritime Restrictions)
or, in the case of uncertificated shares, mandating that the record holder 
thereof be sent a written notice containing the information in the applicable 
legend within a reasonable time after the issuance or transfer thereof in 
accordance with Delaware law. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA3961 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3962 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"><I>Maritime 
Restrictions Severable </I></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3963 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3964 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">The Maritime Restrictions are intended to be severable. If any one or 
more of the Maritime Restrictions is held to be invalid, illegal or 
unenforceable, our certificate of incorporation provides that the validity, 
legality or enforceability of any other provision will not be affected.
</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3965 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<DIV id=PGBK5285  style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<DIV id=PGFTR5285  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV id=PGNUM5285  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: 
center">14</DIV>
<HR style="HEIGHT: 2px; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV id=PGHDR5285  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P id=PARA5285.2 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3966 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"><I>National 
Securities Exchange </I></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3967 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3968 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">In order for us to comply with any conditions to listing the shares of 
our Class A common stock that may be specified by any applicable national 
securities exchange or automated inter-dealer quotation service, our certificate
of incorporation also provides that nothing therein, such as the provisions 
voiding transfers to non-U.S. citizens, will preclude the settlement of any 
transaction entered into through any such applicable national securities 
exchange or automated inter-dealer quotation service if such preclusion is 
prohibited by such exchange or quotation service. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3969 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3970 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"><I>Our Class
B Common Stock, Termination of Maritime Restrictions </I></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3971 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3972 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">Shares of our Class B common stock will not be subject to the Maritime 
Restrictions. Initially, shares of our Class B common stock will only be issued 
upon the conversion of all of the outstanding and treasury shares of our Class A
common stock into outstanding or treasury shares of our Class B common stock, as
the case may be. Each outstanding and treasury share of our Class A common stock
will be automatically converted into one share of our Class B common stock in 
the event our Board determines that either: </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3973 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB3975  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA3976 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA3977 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">the U.S. ownership requirements of the applicable
U.S. maritime and vessel documentation laws are no longer applicable to the 
Company (or have been amended so that the Maritime Restrictions are no longer
necessary); or </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA3978 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB3980  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA3981 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA3982 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">the elimination of such restrictions is in the 
best interest of the Company and our stockholders. Thereafter, the converted 
shares of our Class A common stock will be canceled, will no longer be 
outstanding and cannot be reissued. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA3983 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<DIV id=PGBK3986  style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<DIV id=PGFTR3986  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV id=PGNUM3986  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: 
center">15</DIV>
<HR style="HEIGHT: 2px; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV id=PGHDR3986  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P id=PARA3986.2 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3989 style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif; TEXT-
TRANSFORM: uppercase"><B>DESCRIPTION OF PREFERRED STOCK&nbsp;</B></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3990 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3991 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"><B>General 
</B></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3992 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3993 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">Our certificate of incorporation authorizes us to issue, without 
stockholder approval, up to 2,000,000 shares of preferred stock, without par 
value. As of the date of this prospectus, we have not issued any preferred 
stock. Our board of directors may from time to time authorize us to issue one or
more series of preferred stock and may fix the designation, terms, and relative 
rights and preferences, including the dividend rate, voting rights, conversion 
rights, redemption and sinking fund provisions and liquidation values of each of
these series. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3994 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3995 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">As a result, our board of directors could authorize us to issue preferred
stock with voting, conversion and other rights that could adversely affect the 
voting power and other rights of holders of our common stock or other series of 
preferred stock. Also, the issuance of preferred stock could have the effect of 
delaying, deferring or preventing a change in control of our company. 
</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3996 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3997 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">The particular terms of any series of preferred stock that we offer with 
this prospectus will be described in the prospectus supplement relating to that 
series of preferred stock. Those terms must include: </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA3998 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4000  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4001 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4002 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">the designation of the series, which may be by 
distinguishing number, letter and title; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4003 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4005  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4006 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4007 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">the number of shares of the series; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4008 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4010  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4011 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4012 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">the price at which the preferred stock will be 
issued; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4013 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4015  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4016 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4017 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">the dividend rate, if any, or the method of 
calculation, including whether dividends shall be cumulative or non-cumulative; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4018 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4020  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>

payable; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>

</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4038 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-

<P id=PARA4043 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-

LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:

</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4048 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-

<TABLE id=MTAB4050  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4051 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt;

Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">restrictions on the issuance of shares of the

<P id=PARA4053 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4055  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4056 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4057 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">the voting rights, if 
any.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4058 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<DIV id=PGBK4059  style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<DIV id=PGFTR4059  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV id=PGNUM4059  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: 
center">16</DIV>
<HR style="HEIGHT: 2px; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV id=PGHDR4059  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P id=PARA4059.2 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4062 style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif; TEXT-
TRANSFORM: uppercase"><B>DESCRIPTION OF DEBT SECURITIES&nbsp;</B></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4063 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4064 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">The &#8220;Debt Securities&#8221; will be either our senior debt 
securities (&#8220;Senior Debt Securities&#8221;) or our subordinated debt 
securities (&#8220;Subordinated Debt Securities&#8221;). The Senior Debt 
Securities and the Subordinated Debt Securities will be issued under separate 
indentures among us, the Subsidiary Guarantors of such Debt Securities, if 
any,&nbsp;and U.S. Bank, National Association, as&nbsp;trustee (the 
&#8220;Trustee&#8221;). Senior Debt Securities will be issued under a 
&#8220;Senior Indenture&#8221; and Subordinated Debt Securities will be issued 
under a &#8220;Subordinated Indenture.&#8221; Together, the Senior Indenture and
the Subordinated Indenture are called &#8220;Indentures.&#8221; </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4065 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4066 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">The Debt Securities may be issued from time to time in one or more 
series. The particular terms of each series that are offered by a prospectus 
supplement will be described in the prospectus supplement. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4067 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4068 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">Unless the Debt Securities are guaranteed by our subsidiaries as 
described below, our rights and the rights of our creditors, including holders 
of the Debt Securities, to participate in the assets of any subsidiary upon the 
latter&#8217;s liquidation or reorganization, will be subject to the prior 
claims of the subsidiary&#8217;s creditors, except to the extent that we may 
ourself be a creditor with recognized claims against such subsidiary. 
</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4069 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4070 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">We have summarized selected provisions of the Indentures below. The 
summary is not complete. The form of each Indenture has been filed with the SEC 
as an exhibit to the registration statement of which this prospectus is a part, 
and you should read the Indentures for provisions that may be important to you. 
Capitalized terms used in the summary have the meanings specified in the 
Indentures. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4071 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4072 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"><B>General 
</B></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4073 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4074 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">The Indentures provide that Debt Securities in separate series may be 
issued thereunder from time to time without limitation as to aggregate principal
amount. We may specify a maximum aggregate principal amount for the Debt 
Securities of any series. We will determine the terms and conditions of the Debt
Securities, including the maturity, principal and interest, but those terms must
be consistent with the Indenture. The Debt Securities will be our unsecured 
obligations. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4075 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4076 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">The Subordinated Debt Securities will be subordinated in right of payment
to the prior payment in full of all of our Senior Debt (as defined) as described
under &#8220;&#8212; Subordination of Subordinated Debt Securities&#8221; and in
the prospectus supplement applicable to any Subordinated Debt Securities. If the
prospectus supplement so indicates, the Debt Securities will be convertible into
our common stock. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4077 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4078 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">If specified in the prospectus supplement respecting a particular series 
of Debt Securities, any of our current and future subsidiaries specified in the 
prospectus supplement (each a &#8220;Subsidiary Guarantor&#8221;) will fully and
unconditionally guarantee (the &#8220;Subsidiary Guarantee&#8221;) that series 
as described under &#8220;&#8212; Subsidiary Guarantee&#8221; and in the 
prospectus supplement. Each Subsidiary Guarantee will be an unsecured obligation
of the Subsidiary Guarantor. A Subsidiary Guarantee of Subordinated Debt
Securities will be subordinated to the Senior Debt of the Subsidiary Guarantor 
on the same basis as the Subordinated Debt Securities are subordinated to our 
Senior Debt. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4079 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4080 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">The applicable prospectus supplement will set forth the price or prices 
at which the Debt Securities to be issued will be offered for sale and will 
describe the following terms of such Debt Securities: </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4081 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4083  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4084 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(1)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4085 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">the title of the Debt Securities; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4086 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4088  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4089 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(2)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4090 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">whether the Debt Securities are Senior Debt 
Securities or Subordinated Debt Securities and, if Subordinated Debt Securities,
the related subordination terms; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4091 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4093  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4094 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(3)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4095 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">whether any Subsidiary Guarantor will provide a 
Subsidiary Guarantee of the Debt Securities; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4096 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4098  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4099 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(4)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4100 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">any limit on the aggregate principal amount of 
the Debt Securities; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4101 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4103  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4104 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(5)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4105 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">each date on which the principal of the Debt 
Securities will be payable; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4106 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4108  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4109 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(6)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4110 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">the interest rate that the Debt Securities will 
bear and the interest payment dates for the Debt Securities; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4111 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT><FONT

<DIV id=PGNUM5286  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: 
center">17</DIV>
<HR style="HEIGHT: 2px; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; COLOR: #000000"
