Times New Roman, Times, serif">certain events of bankruptcy, insolvency or 
reorganization affecting us, any Significant Subsidiary or, if a Subsidiary 
Guarantor has guaranteed the series, such Subsidiary Guarantor; and 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4327 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4329  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4330 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(9)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4331 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">if any Subsidiary Guarantor has guaranteed such 
series, the Subsidiary Guarantee of any such Subsidiary Guarantor is held by a 
final non-appealable order or judgment of a court of competent jurisdiction to 
be unenforceable or invalid or ceases for any reason to be in full force and 
effect (other than in accordance with the terms of the applicable Indenture) or 
any Subsidiary Guarantor or any Person acting on behalf of any Subsidiary 
Guarantor denies or disaffirms such Subsidiary Guarantor&#8217;s obligations 
under its Subsidiary Guarantee (other than by reason of a release of such 
Subsidiary Guarantor from its Subsidiary Guarantee in accordance with the terms 
of the applicable Indenture). </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4332 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<DIV id=PGBK5291  style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<DIV id=PGFTR5291  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV id=PGNUM5291  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: 
center">22</DIV>
<HR style="HEIGHT: 2px; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV id=PGHDR5291  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P id=PARA5291.2 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4333 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">If an Event of Default (other than an Event of Default with respect to 
Gastar described in clause (8) above) with respect to the Debt Securities of any
series at the time Outstanding occurs and is continuing, either the applicable 
Trustee or the Holders of at least 25% in principal amount of the Outstanding
Debt Securities of that series by notice as provided in the Indenture may 
declare the principal amount of the Debt Securities of that series (or, in the 
case of any Debt Security that is an Original Issue Discount Debt Security, such
portion of the principal amount of such Debt Security as may be specified in the
terms of such Debt Security) to be due and payable immediately, together with 
any accrued and unpaid interest thereon. If an Event of Default with respect to 
Gastar described in clause (8) above with respect to the Debt Securities of any 
series at the time Outstanding occurs, the principal amount of all the Debt 
Securities of that series (or, in the case of any such Original Issue Discount 
Security, such specified amount) will automatically, and without any action by 
the applicable Trustee or any Holder, become immediately due and payable, 
together with any accrued and unpaid interest thereon. After any such 
acceleration and its consequences, but before a judgment or decree based on 
acceleration, the Holders of a majority in principal amount of the Outstanding 
Debt Securities of that series may, under certain circumstances, rescind and 
annul such acceleration if all Events of Default with respect to that series, 
other than the non-payment of accelerated principal (or other specified amount),
have been cured or waived as provided in the applicable Indenture. For 
information as to waiver of defaults, see &#8220;&#8212; Modification and 
Waiver&#8221; below. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4334 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4335 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">Subject to the provisions of the Indentures relating to the duties of the
Trustees in case an Event of Default has occurred and is continuing, no Trustee 
will be under any obligation to exercise any of its rights or powers under the 
applicable Indenture at the request or direction of any of the Holders, unless 
such Holders have offered to such Trustee security or indemnity satisfactory to 
the Trustee. Subject to such provisions for the indemnification of the Trustees,
the Holders of a majority in principal amount of the Outstanding Debt Securities
of any series will have the right to direct the time, method and place of 
conducting any proceeding for any remedy available to such Trustee or exercising
any trust or power conferred on such Trustee with respect to the Debt Securities
of that series. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4336 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4337 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">No Holder of a Debt Security of any series will have any right to 
institute any proceeding with respect to the applicable Indenture, or for the 
appointment of a receiver or a trustee, or for any other remedy thereunder, 
unless: </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4338 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4340  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4341 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(1)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4342 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">such Holder has previously given to the Trustee 
under the applicable Indenture written notice of a continuing Event of Default 
with respect to the Debt Securities of that series; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4343 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4345  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4346 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(2)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4347 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">the Holders of at least 25% in principal amount 
of the Outstanding Debt Securities of that series have made written request, and
such Holder or Holders have offered security or indemnity satisfactory&nbsp;to 
the Trustee to institute such proceeding as trustee; and 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4348 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4350  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4351 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(3)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4352 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">the Trustee has failed to institute such 
proceeding, and has not received from the Holders of a majority in principal 
amount of the Outstanding Debt Securities of that series a direction 
inconsistent with such request, within 60 days after such notice, request and 
offer. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4353 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4354 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">However, such limitations do not apply to a suit instituted by a Holder 
of a Debt Security for the enforcement of payment of the principal of or any 
premium or interest on such Debt Security on or after the applicable due date 
specified in such Debt Security or, if applicable, to convert such Debt 
Security. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4355 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4356 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">We will be required to furnish to each Trustee annually a statement by 
certain of our officers, to their knowledge, as to whether or not we are in 
default in the performance or observance of any of the terms, provisions and 
conditions of the applicable Indenture and, if so, specifying all such known 
defaults. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4357 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4358 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif"><B>Modification and Waiver </B></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4359 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4360 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">We may modify or amend an Indenture without the consent of any holders of
the Debt Securities in certain circumstances, including: </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4361 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4363  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4364 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(1)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4365 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">to evidence the succession under the Indenture of
another Person to us or any Subsidiary Guarantor and to provide for its 
assumption of our or such Subsidiary Guarantor&#8217;s obligations to holders of
Debt Securities; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4366 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<DIV id=PGBK5292  style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<DIV id=PGFTR5292  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV id=PGNUM5292  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: 
center">23</DIV>
<HR style="HEIGHT: 2px; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV id=PGHDR5292  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P id=PARA5292.2 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4368  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4369 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(2)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4370 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">to make any changes that would add any additional
covenants of us or the Subsidiary Guarantors for the benefit of the holders of 
Debt Securities or that do not adversely affect the rights under the Indenture 
of the Holders of Debt Securities in any material respect; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4371 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4373  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4374 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(3)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4375 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">to add any additional Events of Default; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4376 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4378  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4379 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(4)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4380 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">to provide for uncertificated notes in addition 
to or in place of certificated notes; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4381 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4383  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4384 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(5)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4385 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">to secure the Debt Securities; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4386 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4388  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4389 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(6)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4390 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">to establish the form or terms of any series of 
Debt Securities; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4391 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4393  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4394 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(7)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4395 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">to evidence and provide for the acceptance of 
appointment under the Indenture of a successor Trustee;
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4396 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4398  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4399 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(8)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4400 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">to cure any ambiguity, defect or inconsistency; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4401 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4403  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4404 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(9)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4405 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">to add Subsidiary Guarantors; or 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4406 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4408  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4409 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(10)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4410 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">in the case of any Subordinated Debt Security, to
make any change in the subordination provisions that limits or terminates the 
benefits applicable to any Holder of Senior Debt. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4411 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4412 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">Other modifications and amendments of an Indenture may be made by us, the
Subsidiary Guarantors, if applicable, and the applicable Trustee with the 
consent of the Holders of a majority in principal amount of the Outstanding Debt
Securities of each series affected by such modification or amendment; provided, 
however, that no such modification or amendment may, without the consent of the 
Holder of each Outstanding Debt Security affected thereby: </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4413 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4415  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4416 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(1)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4417 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">change the Stated Maturity of the principal of, 
or any installment of principal of or interest on, any Debt Security; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4418 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4420  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4421 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(2)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4422 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">reduce the principal amount of, or any premium or
interest on, any Debt Security; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4423 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4425  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4426 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(3)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4427 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">reduce the amount of principal of an Original 
Issue Discount Security or any other Debt Security payable upon acceleration of 
the Maturity thereof; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4428 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4430  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4431 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(4)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4432 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">change the place or currency of payment of 
principal of, or any premium or interest on, any Debt Security; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4433 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4435  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4436 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(5)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4437 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">impair the right to institute suit for the 
enforcement of any payment due on or any conversion right with respect to any 
Debt Security; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4438 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4440  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4441 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(6)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4442 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">modify the subordination provisions in the case 
of Subordinated Debt Securities, or modify any conversion provisions, in either 
case in a manner adverse to the Holders of the Subordinated Debt Securities; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4443 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4445  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4446 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(7)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4447 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">except as provided in the applicable Indenture, 
release the Subsidiary Guarantee of a Subsidiary Guarantor; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4448 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4450  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4451 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(8)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4452 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt;
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">reduce the percentage in principal amount of 
Outstanding Debt Securities of any series, the consent of whose Holders is 
required for modification or amendment of the Indenture; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4453 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4455  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4456 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(9)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4457 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">reduce the percentage in principal amount of 
Outstanding Debt Securities of any series necessary for waiver of compliance 
with certain provisions of the Indenture or for waiver of certain defaults; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4458 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4460  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4461 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(10)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4462 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">modify such provisions with respect to 
modification, amendment or waiver; or </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4463 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4465  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4466 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(11)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4467 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">following the making of an offer to purchase Debt
Securities from any Holder that has been made pursuant to a covenant in such 
Indenture, modify such covenant in a manner adverse to such Holder. 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4468 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4469 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">The Holders of a majority in principal amount of the Outstanding Debt 
Securities of any series may waive compliance by us with certain restrictive 
provisions of the applicable Indenture. The Holders of a majority in principal
amount of the Outstanding Debt Securities of any series may waive any past 
default under the applicable Indenture, except a default in the payment of 
principal, premium or interest and certain covenants and provisions of the 
Indenture which cannot be amended without the consent of the Holder of each 
Outstanding Debt Security of such series. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4470 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<DIV id=PGBK5293  style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<DIV id=PGFTR5293  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV id=PGNUM5293  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: 
center">24</DIV>
<HR style="HEIGHT: 2px; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV id=PGHDR5293  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P id=PARA5293.2 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4471 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">Each of the Indentures provides that in determining whether the Holders 
of the requisite principal amount of the Outstanding Debt Securities have given 
or taken any direction, notice, consent, waiver or other action under such 
Indenture as of any date: </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4472 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4474  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4475 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(1)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4476 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">the principal amount of an Original Issue 
Discount Security that will be deemed to be Outstanding will be the amount of 
the principal that would be due and payable as of such date upon acceleration of
maturity to such date; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4477 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4479  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4480 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(2)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4481 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">if, as of such date, the principal amount payable
at the Stated Maturity of a Debt Security is not determinable (for example, 
because it is based on an index), the principal amount of such Debt Security 
deemed to be Outstanding as of such date will be an amount determined in the 
manner prescribed for such Debt Security; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4482 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4484  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4485 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(3)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4486 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">the principal amount of a Debt Security 
denominated in one or more foreign currencies or currency units that will be 
deemed to be Outstanding will be the United States-dollar equivalent, determined
as of such date in the manner prescribed for such Debt Security, of the 
principal amount of such Debt Security (or, in the case of a Debt Security 
described in clause (1) or (2) above, of the amount described in such clause); 
and </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4487 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4489  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4490 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(4)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4491 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">certain Debt Securities, including those owned by
us, any Subsidiary Guarantor or any of our other Affiliates, will not be deemed 
to be Outstanding. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4492 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4493 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">Except in certain limited circumstances, we will be entitled to set any 
day as a record date for the purpose of determining the Holders of Outstanding 
Debt Securities of any series entitled to give or take any direction, notice, 
consent, waiver or other action under the applicable Indenture, in the manner 
and subject to the limitations provided in the Indenture. In certain limited 
circumstances, the applicable Trustee will be entitled to set a record date for 
action by Holders. If a record date is set for any action to be taken by Holders
of a particular series, only persons who are Holders of Outstanding Debt 
Securities of that series on the record date may take such action. To be 
effective, such action must be taken by Holders of the requisite principal 
amount of such Debt Securities within a specified period following the record 
date. For any particular record date, this period will be 180 days or such other
period as may be specified by us (or the applicable&nbsp;Trustee, if it set the 
record date), and may be shortened or lengthened (but not beyond 180 days) from 
time to time. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4494 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4495 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif"><B>Satisfaction and Discharge </B></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4496 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4497 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">Each Indenture will be discharged and will cease to be of further effect
as to all outstanding Debt Securities of any series issued thereunder, when: 
</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4498 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4500  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4501 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(1)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4502 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">either: </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4503 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4505  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4506 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(a)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4507 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">all outstanding Debt Securities of that series 
that have been authenticated (except lost, stolen or destroyed Debt Securities 
that have been replaced or paid and Debt Securities for whose payment money has 
theretofore been deposited in trust and thereafter repaid to us) have been 
delivered to the Trustee for cancellation; or </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4508 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4510  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4511 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(b)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4512 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">all outstanding Debt Securities of that series 
that have been not delivered to the Trustee for cancellation have become due and
payable or will become due and payable at their Stated Maturity within one year 
or are to be called for redemption within one year under arrangements 
satisfactory to the Trustee and in any case we have irrevocably deposited with 
the Trustee as trust funds money in an amount sufficient, without consideration 
of any reinvestment of interest, to pay the entire indebtedness of such Debt 
Securities not delivered to the Trustee for cancellation, for principal, 
premium, if any, and accrued interest to the Stated Maturity or redemption date;
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4513 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<DIV id=PGBK5294  style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<DIV id=PGFTR5294  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV id=PGNUM5294  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: 
center">25</DIV>
<HR style="HEIGHT: 2px; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV id=PGHDR5294  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P id=PARA5294.2 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4515  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4516 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(2)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4517 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">we have paid or caused to be paid all other sums 
payable by us under the Indenture with respect to the Debt Securities of that 
series; and </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4518 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4520  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4521 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(3)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4522 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">we have delivered an Officers&#8217; Certificate 
and an Opinion of Counsel to the Trustee stating that all conditions precedent 
to satisfaction and discharge of the Indenture with respect to the Debt 
Securities of that series have been satisfied. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4523 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4524 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"><B>Legal 
Defeasance and Covenant Defeasance </B></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4525 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4526 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">To the extent indicated in the applicable prospectus supplement, we may 
elect, at our option at any time, to have our obligations discharged under 
provisions relating to defeasance and discharge of indebtedness, which we call 
&#8220;legal defeasance,&#8221; or relating to defeasance of certain restrictive
covenants applied to the Debt Securities of any series, or to any specified part
of a series, which we call &#8220;covenant defeasance&#8221;. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4527 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4528 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif"><I>Legal Defeasance</I>. The Indentures provide that, upon our exercise 
of our option (if any) to have the legal defeasance provisions applied to any 
series of Debt Securities, we and, if applicable, each Subsidiary Guarantor will
be discharged from all our obligations, and, if such Debt Securities are 
Subordinated Debt Securities, the provisions of the Subordinated Indenture 
relating to subordination will cease to be effective, with respect to such Debt 
Securities (except for certain obligations to convert, exchange or register the 
transfer of Debt Securities, to replace stolen, lost or mutilated Debt 
Securities, to maintain paying agencies and to hold moneys for payment in trust)
upon the deposit in trust for the benefit of the Holders of such Debt Securities
of money or U.S. Government Obligations, or both, which, through the payment of 
principal and interest in respect thereof in accordance with their terms, will 
provide money in an amount sufficient (in the opinion of a nationally recognized
firm of independent public accountants) to pay the principal of and any premium 
and interest on such Debt Securities on the respective Stated Maturities in 
accordance with the terms of the applicable Indenture and such Debt Securities. 
Such defeasance or discharge may occur only if, among other things: </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4529 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4531  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4532 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(1)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4533 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">we have delivered to the applicable Trustee an 
Opinion of Counsel to the effect that we have received from, or there has been 
published by, the United States Internal Revenue Service a ruling, or there has 
been a change in tax law, in either case to the effect that Holders of such Debt
Securities will not recognize gain or loss for federal income tax purposes as a 
result of such deposit and legal defeasance and will be subject to federal 
income tax on the same amount, in the same manner and at the same times as would
have been the case if such deposit and legal defeasance were not to occur; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4534 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4536  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4537 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(2)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4538 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">no Event of Default or event that with the 
passing of time or the giving of notice, or both, shall constitute an Event of 
Default shall have occurred and be continuing at the time of such deposit or, 
with respect to any Event of Default described in clause (8) under 
&#8220;&#8212; Events of Default,&#8221; at any time until 121 days after such 
deposit; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4539 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4541  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4542 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(3)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4543 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">such deposit and legal defeasance will not result
in a breach or violation of, or constitute a default under, any agreement or 
instrument (other than the applicable Indenture) to which we are a party or by 
which we are bound; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4544 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4546  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4547 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(4)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4548 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">in the case of Subordinated Debt Securities, at 
the time of such deposit, no default in the payment of all or a portion of 
principal of (or premium, if any) or interest on any Senior Debt shall have 
occurred and be continuing, no event of default shall have resulted in the 
acceleration of any Senior Debt and no other event of default with respect to 
any Senior Debt shall have occurred and be continuing permitting after notice or
the lapse of time, or both, the acceleration thereof; and 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4549 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4551  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 17pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 19pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4552 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">(5)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4553 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">we have delivered to the Trustee an Opinion of 
Counsel to the effect that such deposit shall not cause the Trustee or the trust
so created to be subject to the Investment Company Act of 1940. 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4554 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<DIV id=PGBK5295  style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<DIV id=PGFTR5295  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV id=PGNUM5295  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: 
center">26</DIV>
<HR style="HEIGHT: 2px; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV id=PGHDR5295  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P id=PARA5295.2 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4555 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif"><I>Covenant Defeasance</I>. The Indentures provide that, upon our 
exercise of our option (if any) to have the covenant defeasance provisions 
applied to any Debt Securities, we may fail to comply with certain restrictive 
covenants (but not with respect to conversion, if applicable), including those 
that may be described in the applicable prospectus supplement, and the 
occurrence of certain Events of Default, which are described above in clause (5)
(with respect to such restrictive covenants) and clauses (6), (7) and (9) under 
&#8220;Events of Default&#8221; and any that may be described in the applicable 
prospectus supplement, will not be deemed to either be or result in an Event of 
Default and, if such Debt Securities are Subordinated Debt Securities, the 
provisions of the Subordinated Indenture relating to subordination will cease to
be effective, in each case with respect to such Debt Securities. In order to 
exercise such option, we must deposit, in trust for the benefit of the Holders 
of such Debt Securities, money or U.S. Government Obligations, or both, which, 
through the payment of principal and interest in respect thereof in accordance 
with their terms, will provide money in an amount sufficient (in the opinion of 
a nationally recognized firm of independent public accountants) to pay the 
principal of and any premium and interest on such Debt Securities on the 
respective Stated Maturities in accordance with the terms of the applicable 
Indenture and such Debt Securities. Such covenant defeasance may occur only if 
we have delivered to the applicable Trustee an Opinion of Counsel to the effect 
that Holders of such Debt Securities will not recognize gain or loss for federal
income tax purposes as a result of such deposit and covenant defeasance and will
be subject to federal income tax on the same amount, in the same manner and at 
the same times as would have been the case if such deposit and covenant 
defeasance were not to occur, and the requirements set forth in clauses (2), 
(3), (4) and (5) above are satisfied. If we exercise this option with respect to
any series of Debt Securities and such Debt Securities were declared due and 
payable because of the occurrence of any Event of Default, the amount of money 
and U.S. Government Obligations so deposited in trust would be sufficient to pay
amounts due on such Debt Securities at the time of their respective Stated 
Maturities but may not be sufficient to pay amounts due on such Debt Securities 
upon any acceleration resulting from such Event of Default. In such case, we 
would remain liable for such payments. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4556 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4557 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">If we exercise either our legal defeasance or covenant defeasance option,
any Subsidiary Guarantee will terminate. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4558 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4559 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"><B>No 
Personal Liability of Directors, Officers, Employees and Stockholders 
</B></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4560 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4561 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">No director, officer, employee, incorporator, stockholder, member, 
partner or trustee of the Company or any Subsidiary Guarantor, as such, shall 
have any liability for any obligations of the Company or any Subsidiary 
Guarantor under the Debt Securities, the Indentures or any Subsidiary Guarantees
or for any claim based on, in respect of, or by reason of, such obligations or 
their creation. By accepting a Debt Security, each Holder shall be deemed to 
have waived and released all such liability. The waiver and release shall be a 
part of the consideration for the issue of the Debt Securities. The waiver may 
not be effective to waive liabilities under the federal securities laws, and it 
is the view of the SEC that such a waiver is against public policy. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4562 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4563 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"><B>Notices 
</B></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4564 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4565 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">Notices to Holders of Debt Securities will be given by mail to the 
addresses of such Holders as they may appear in the Security Register. 
</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4566 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4567 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"><B>Title 
</B></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4568 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4569 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">We, the Subsidiary Guarantors, the Trustees and any agent of us, the 
Subsidiary Guarantors or a Trustee may treat the Person in whose name a Debt 
Security is registered as the absolute owner of the Debt Security (whether or 
not such Debt Security may be overdue) for the purpose of making payment and for
all other purposes. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4570 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4571 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"><B>Governing
Law </B></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4572 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4573 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">The Indentures and the Debt Securities will be governed by, and construed
in accordance with, the law of the State of New York. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4574 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4575 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"><B>The 
Trustee </B></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4576 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4577 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">We will enter into the Indentures with a Trustee that is qualified to act
under the Trust Indenture Act of 1939, as amended, and with any other Trustees 
chosen by us and appointed in a supplemental indenture for a particular series 
of Debt Securities. We may maintain a banking relationship in the ordinary 
course of business with our Trustee and one or more of its affiliates. 
</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4578 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4579 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif"><I>Resignation or Removal of Trustee</I>. If the Trustee has or acquires 
a conflicting interest within the meaning of the Trust Indenture Act, the 
Trustee must either eliminate its conflicting interest or resign, to the extent 
and in the manner provided by, and subject to the provisions of, the Trust 
Indenture Act and the applicable Indenture. Any resignation will require the 
appointment of a successor Trustee under the applicable Indenture in accordance 
with the terms and conditions of such Indenture. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4580 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<DIV id=PGBK5296  style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<DIV id=PGFTR5296  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV id=PGNUM5296  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: 
center">27</DIV>
<HR style="HEIGHT: 2px; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV id=PGHDR5296  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P id=PARA5296.2 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4581 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">The Trustee may resign or be removed by us with respect to one or more 
series of Debt Securities and a successor Trustee may be appointed to act with 
respect to any such series. The holders of a majority in aggregate principal 
amount of the Debt Securities of any series may remove the Trustee with respect 
to the Debt Securities of such series. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4582 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4583 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif"><I>Limitations on Trustee if It Is Our Creditor</I>. Each Indenture will 
contain certain limitations on the right of the Trustee, in the event that it 
becomes our creditor, to obtain payment of claims in certain cases, or to 
realize on certain property received in respect of any such claim as security or
otherwise. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4584 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4585 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif"><I>Certificates and Opinions to Be Furnished to Trustee</I>. Each 
Indenture will provide that, in addition to other certificates or opinions that 
may be specifically required by other provisions of an Indenture, every 
application by us for action by the Trustee must be accompanied by an 
Officers&#8217; Certificate and an Opinion of Counsel stating that, in the 
opinion of the signers, all conditions precedent to such action have been 
complied with. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4587.1 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<DIV id=PGBK4587  style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<DIV id=PGFTR4587  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV id=PGNUM4587  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: 
center">28</DIV>
<HR style="HEIGHT: 2px; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV id=PGHDR4587  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P id=PARA4587.2 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4590 style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif; TEXT-
TRANSFORM: uppercase"><B>DESCRIPTION OF WARRANTS&nbsp;</B></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4591 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4592 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">We summarize below some of the provisions that will apply to the warrants
unless the applicable prospectus supplement provides otherwise. The summary may 
not contain all information that is important to you. The complete terms of the 
warrants will be contained in the applicable warrant certificate and warrant 
agreement. These documents have been or will be included or incorporated by 
reference as exhibits to the registration statement of which this prospectus is 
a part. You should read the warrant certificate and the warrant agreement. You 
should also read the prospectus supplement, which will contain additional
information and which may update or change some of the information below. 
</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4593 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4594 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"><B>General 
</B></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4595 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4596 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">We may issue warrants to purchase common stock independently or together 
with other securities. The warrants may be attached to or separate from the 
other securities. We may issue warrants in one or more series. Each series of 
warrants will be issued under a separate warrant agreement to be entered into 
between us and a warrant agent. The warrant agent will be our agent and will not
assume any obligations to any holder or beneficial owner of the warrants. 
</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4597 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4598 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">The prospectus supplement and the warrant agreement relating to any 
series of warrants will include specific terms of the warrants. These terms 
include the following: </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4599 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4602 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt;

<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">

Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">the title and aggregate number of warrants; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4604 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4644 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-

<TABLE id=MTAB4646  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,

<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>

<P id=PARA4647 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt;

warrants.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4649 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4650 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">Unless otherwise specified in a prospectus supplement, the warrants will 
be represented by certificates. The warrants may be exchanged under the terms 
outlined in the warrant agreement. We will not charge any service charges for 
any transfer or exchange of warrant certificates, but we may require payment for
tax or other governmental charges in connection with the exchange or transfer. 
Unless the prospectus supplement states otherwise, until a warrant is exercised,
a holder will not be entitled to any payments on or have any rights with respect
to the common stock issuable upon exercise of the warrant. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4651 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4652 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"><B>Exercise 
of Warrants </B></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4653 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4654 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-
INDENT: 18pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">To exercise the warrants, the holder must provide the warrant agent with 
the following: </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA4655 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4657  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4658 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">

LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">payment of the exercise 
price;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA4660 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=MTAB4662  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4663 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman, Times, serif">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-

<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
